name: Live Jazz Night
description: Enjoy a relaxing evening with live jazz music at a cozy bar in the city center.

name: Hiking
description: Explore the natural beauty of the Seich Sou forest with a guided hiking tour.

name: Museum Visit
description: Discover ancient artifacts and learn about the rich history of Thessaloniki at the Archaeological Museum.

name: Ziplining Adventure
description: Experience the thrill of ziplining over the park's breathtaking scenery.

name: Photography Walk
description: Capture stunning views of the Thermaic Gulf and iconic landmarks on a guided photography walk.

name: Rembetiko Night
description: Authentic Rembetiko music in a traditional taverna in Ano Poli.

name: Indie Band Showcase
description: Discover new local indie bands at a popular live stage.

name: Kayaking in Thermaikos
description: Paddle along the coastline and enjoy unique city views from the sea.

name: Bird Watching Axios
description: Observe diverse bird species at the Axios Delta National Park.

name: Bike Tour Waterfront
description: A relaxing bicycle ride along Thessaloniki's renovated waterfront.

name: Byzantine Walls Tour
description: Walk the ancient Byzantine walls and learn their history.

name: Street Art Hunt
description: Explore vibrant murals and graffiti in hidden city corners.

name: Visit White Tower
description: Explore the city's iconic landmark and its museum.

name: Scuba Diving Intro
description: Discover underwater life with an introductory scuba session.

name: Climbing Hortiatis
description: Beginner-friendly rock climbing on Mount Hortiatis.
